[/font]  was a bit borred  so I made a preset :/
I hope you guys like it.


[img]http://i1376.photobucket.com/albums/ah13/selbaccro/kombajnano_zpsns9feodg.jpg[/img]


[font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b]Requirements
[/b]
[/size][/font][/color][color=#fce5cd][font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][size=4]RaceMenu[/size][/url]

[size=6][b]Recommendations
[/b][/size]
[/font][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight

[/url]
[/size][/color]
If you want to have the same looking character as on the image up there I would highly recommend to download all of these but
Keep in mind that they are not [color=#ffff00]requirements![/color]



[size=6]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#fce5cd][b]How to Install?

[/b][/color][/font][/size]For some of you installing directly wont work well for those, you should unzip the file,and drag or copy it
to the : [color=#ffff00]overwrite\skse\plugins\CharGen\Presets[/color]
From then when you load your game open console using button left of 1,and the console should pop up
inside of console type [color=#ffff00]showracemenu [/color]


[img]http://i1376.photobucket.com/albums/ah13/selbaccro/da%20nauce_zps7ccvijit.jpg[/img] [/center]
author: SharzaaR
